name: Social Situations
description:
This game is all about making people feel BAD.

You might think you want the people in the game to be happy, but you will soon find out that that is not the case.

Go through a variety of social situations and try to put people in the worst mood possible. 

From making friends to pitching a game idea, if your looking to make someone feel bad, don't do it in real life. Do it in social situations

Credits:

Coding: RockySop (me)

Art: RockySop

SFX: Benedict

Music: AIVA
